object.name: Bolognese
object.description: desc ="with minced meat, vegetables and tomato sauce\r\n Ingredients: • Onions, garlic, carrots, celery • Minced meat • Tomato sauce • Basil, oregano, salt, pepper, thyme • oil"
object.sbs_description: 1. heat saucepan, add oil, vegetables, thyme and salt 2. add minced meat and cook until browned all over 3. add tomato sauce and simmer 4. add some more spices

object.name: Pancakes
object.description: desc ="sweet and fluffy pancakes \r\n Ingredients: • flour • milk • eggs • butter • sugar • salt"
object.sbs_description: 1. whisk egg whites 2. mix egg yolks with rest of ingredients 3. fold in whisked egg whites 4. cook on non-stick pan over medium heat until surface is somewhat dry, then turn over

object.name: Banana bread
object.description: desc ="sweet and light banana bread\r\n Ingredients: • bananas • oil • sugar • flour"
object.sbs_description: 1. heat oven 2. add ingredients in a bowl and mix 3. put dough in oven save form 4. bake for 20 minutes (180C)

object.name: Quiche Lorraine
object.description: desc ="French vegetable tarte\r\n Ingredients: • quiche dough • oil • eggs • whipped cream • cheese • bacon • leek/onion • nutmeg, salt, pepper"
object.sbs_description: 1. roll out pastry, lift into tin 2. beat eggs in a bowl, add cream 3. fry onions/leek and add into bowl 4. add filling into pastry 5. bake 25 min (180 C°)

object.name: fried eggs
object.description: desc ="eggs fried in a pan\r\n Ingredients: • eggs • oil • salt"
object.sbs_description: 1. crack the egg into a pan (medium heat, oiled) 2. add salt, chives 3. keep an eye on the yolks

object.name: Pizza
object.description: desc ="whatever you like on dough\r\n Ingredients: • pizza dough (self-made or bought) • tomato sauce • mozzarella • ham/prosciutto/vegetables"
object.sbs_description: 1. spread tomato sauce 2. spread chunks of mozzarella 3. add toppings and spices you like 4. put in preheated oven on maximum heat for 5-10 min

object.name: Vegetable soup
object.description: desc ="the best of all vegetable soups\r\n Ingredients: • vegetable broth (self-made or instant) • onions, garlic • carrots • celery • parsley, chives, salt, pepper • oil • tomato purée"
object.sbs_description: 1. gently cook onions, carrots and celery 2. add tomato purée, garlic and herbs 3. add broth and let simmer for a while 4. sprinkle with some herbs

object.name: Garlic chicken
object.description: desc ="chicken filet fried in garlic butter\r\n Ingredients: • chicken filet • butter • garlic • salt, pepper, oil "
object.sbs_description: 1. heat pan to medium heat, add butter and smashed garlic 2. add pieces of chicken and cook until golde

object.name: Potato soup
object.description: desc ="rich and tasty potato soup\r\n Ingredients: • onion, garlic • potatoes • brouth • oil/butter, salt, pepper "
object.sbs_description: 1. dice onions, potatoes 2. saute in oil/butter until browned, then add garlic 3. add broth and cook until the potatoes are softened 4. you can add some milk or cream

object.name: Tomato salad
object.description: desc ="quick and healthy tomato salat\r\n Ingredients: • tomatoes • onions • vinegar, olive oil • salt, pepper "
object.sbs_description: 1. dice tomatoes and onions and put them into a bowl 2. add salt, pepper, vinegar and olive oil
